author: hwright
msg: Update to most recent dependency versions.

author: hwright
msg: Reuse an existing ra session when getting copy sources.

author: hwright
msg: Remove the use of a deprecated API.

author: xsteve
msg: (svn-status-dired-jump): Check, if point points to a file location,
if not use default-directory for dired-jump

author: kfogel
msg: Make FSFS recovery able to handle the scenarios we meant it to handle,
(recover_body): Recover from any obsolete db/current file, not just
a missing or r0 db/current file.
readability and to test somewhat more realistically.
